item.title: Gratz on C# Guru Lin!
item.dc:creator: @Tree_Climber Tree_Climber
item.description:
@Tree_Climber wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:53, topic:297283”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=393320.msg2941682#msg2941682 date=1251926967]
Whats this shit, lin C# guru? whoever’s giving out these badges really needs to take another look. From what I’ve seen, lin maybe knows basic C#, every ‘proper’ java guru would know over average C# if not further, more than lin since the two languages are quite alike. Do you just need to whip up a program in any language to get these badges or something? i could understand C# Coder, but guru is too fucking far. Id give an exception to Unhandled since I’ve actually see a lot of his threads and id say hes worthy of it, but not this.

Since moparscape is heavily based around Java, theres more higher end java developers, causing the ‘moparscape java guru’ standard to raise. So far the java guru looks somewhat correct, but this… Id say its an embarrassment to Unhandled. I’ve been working with java for 2 years & C# for 1 year (proper years, not ‘moparscape edit a server every month’ years) and even i don’t consider my self a guru.

Not an attack at Lin personally, just my 2c since it had to be said at some time.
[/quote]I know a lot more than you’d think.[/quote]
Care to provide proof of this?

Read full topic

item.title: Gratz on C# Guru Lin!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:45, topic:297283”][quote author=Lin link=topic=393320.msg2933625#msg2933625 date=1251419344]

[quote author=Tree_Climber link=topic=393320.msg2933618#msg2933618 date=1251419015]

[quote author=Lin link=topic=393320.msg2933611#msg2933611 date=1251418704]

It’s not because I’m a C# guru. Even if Windows does suck (Which it doesn’t), it still beats the hard-failing Linux and Mac OS.
[/quote]Shit like that makes me want to run you over.

Also, not saying it out of rage. But I know you’ve never tried either. Considering you recently moved up to XP from W2k.

kthx.
[/quote]Mmm, suspicions, suspicions… And for your information, I have tried Linux and it was shit. I don’t remember which one it was, but it sucked. Mac, it’s just not Windows which will make you want to run me over even more.

Maybe because you were either 1 too stupid to set it up or 2 downloaded ubuntu.
[/quote]Ha, like I’d install Linux on my own computer. The computer wasn’t even mine. Could explain why it was shit.

It’s funny how you all say I’m stupid because I prefer Windows over Linux, program using a .NET language, and say Linux/Mac sucks. So basically an opinion or look at things determines your intelligence. Interesting.

They can l2wine or stfu because Windows is the dominant OS out of all.[/quote]

True, people just say it’s not because they wont to prove something that they don’t know anything about.

Read full topic

wine sucks[/quote]This. Wine doesn’t make everything compatible with the Linux OS

Lin: Just because you program in a .NET language doesn’t mean that the OS sucks. Linux is way better than Windows. The only up for Windows is the compatibility, and you have not tried Linux. You’ve tried W2k (no option, and you finally figured out how to dual boot with XP (wonder how)). Ya, the computer you use… You got free from your school, GF.

item.title: Gratz on C# Guru Lin!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

@Lin:
Apparently you don’t realize how thorough the Linux Kernel is. Developments are far superior than those for Windows and Mac. Over 4300 new lines of code are added each day to the kernel; 1800 lines removed each day; 1300 lines modified each day. Anyone with intelligence can realize that the Linux Kernel is going somewhere. It contains over 9 million lines of code already.

Source: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L2SED6sewRw

Read full topic

item.title: Gratz on C# Guru Lin!
item.dc:creator: @Tree_Climber Tree_Climber
item.description:
@Tree_Climber wrote:

Lin:

It’s not because I’m a C# guru. Even if Windows does suck (Which it doesn’t), it still beats the hard-failing Linux and Mac OS.

Idiot.

[quote=“Unhandled, post:37, topic:297283”]Holy fuck you’re all retarded, especially you Lin.
C# is NOT a platform dependant language, it is an open standard (unlike Java, which is controlled exclusively by Sun) which anyone can write an implementation of. Mono has done just that, along with the rest of the .NET framework, allowing C# applications to run on pretty much any platform Java SE/EE runs on.

I would also like to add:

[quote author=la­wl link=topic=382528.msg2877859#msg2877859 date=1248148196]
wow what a bunch of fucking idiots go kill yourselves already you useless fucks
[/quote][/quote]
But Sun develops software that runs on multiple platforms anyways so no need for multiple implementations from different developers.

Read full topic

[/quote]This is false. Platform dependent languages and applications are the best! Windows > All.[/quote]

Yes. It run’s more efficient on windows, but when you have Windows, Os X, and Ubuntu tri-booted on your computer then you will need a multi-platform language.
